channel.title: Requiz noobs
channel.description: I think I speak for most people when I say that noobs are annoying. I have an idea that may help with the problem. Make some way of making noobs do the moparscape quiz AGAIN if they write too many nooby posts. Moderators should be able to make noob posters redo the moparscape quiz and they may actually learn something. If not they have to do it again and again!

item.title: Requiz noobs
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:14, topic:175022”][quote author=ada link=topic=235517.msg2009773#msg2009773 date=1201062344]

Quizzing them is just stupid to begin with. Do you take a test without at least learning the material first?

That’s exactly the point, no one actually reads the rules. This quiz would make people study them…
[/quote]
Not necessarily, I for one wouldn’t study the rules at all, I’d just skim everything.

Look guys there will always be noobs - there is nothing you can do about them, you can slow them down with quiz’s but there will still always be noobs. You just gotta learn to live with the occasional “How i play moparscape” and stupid “WHICH IS UR FAVORIT CONSOLE: DREAMCAST OR PLAYSTATIONS”[/quote]

How about the questions are like:

Why would we make a rule like rule [so-and-so]?

Read full topic

item.title: Requiz noobs
item.dc:creator: @Carson Carson
item.description:
@Carson wrote:

Noobs ask questions because they don’t know. They want help. I hate 85% of them though, because they type in “leet” speak. I respect the people that take there time to write out there words. Thats when i attempt to help them.

Read full topic

Quizzing them is just stupid to begin with. Do you take a test without at least learning the material first?
[/quote]
That’s exactly the point, no one actually reads the rules. This quiz would make people study them…[/quote]
Not necessarily, I for one wouldn’t study the rules at all, I’d just skim everything.

Look guys there will always be noobs - there is nothing you can do about them, you can slow them down with quiz’s but there will still always be noobs. You just gotta learn to live with the occasional “How i play moparscape” and stupid “WHICH IS UR FAVORIT CONSOLE: DREAMCAST OR PLAYSTATIONS”

item.title: Requiz noobs
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Quizzing them is just stupid to begin with. Do you take a test without at least learning the material first? No, unless you’re a jock. I think the best thing to do would be to implement my suggestion.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Requiz noobs
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:10, topic:175022”]How about we implement a new quiz system that asks what the rules are and what letters are where in a certain rule (like MANY people have been suggesting FOREVER) so that the moparscapers actually read the rules. If they do not follow them then they can be moderated/muted and then forced to retake the quiz.

And another thing about ‘nooby posts’, moderators exist for a reason. If the moderators do not do their jobs then they should not be a moderator. Part of their job is to clean up spam around the forum.[/quote]
Yeah, I think that would be a good idea. And it would be good to make the questions random each time someone does it and make sure that they are not multi choice… I don’t think a lot of moderators do their jobs as well as they should. Sometimes if a spam post is made, they don’t lock them… Thats not to say that all mods are like that though…

Read full topic

item.title: Requiz noobs
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

How about we implement a new quiz system that asks what the rules are and what letters are where in a certain rule (like MANY people have been suggesting FOREVER) so that the moparscapers actually read the rules. If they do not follow them then they can be moderated/muted and then forced to retake the quiz.

And another thing about ‘nooby posts’, moderators exist for a reason. If the moderators do not do their jobs then they should not be a moderator. Part of their job is to clean up spam around the forum.

Read full topic

item.title: Requiz noobs
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Casey.:

They don’t learn anything, they just use google for the answers.

Wasn’t that the whole point of the quiz?

item.title: Requiz noobs
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

A better idea is to put some of Mopar’s money to good use, and buy a 24/7 phone support service. Using either Indians. Or more intelligent MoparScapers to answer calls, and maybe give them some kind of badge. It may not even have to be a phone support, maybe like an online chat support.

Read full topic

item.title: Requiz noobs
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:6, topic:175022”][quote author=Casey. link=topic=235517.msg2007468#msg2007468 date=1200951255]
What good would it do if they have to retake it?
They don’t learn anything, they just use google for the answers.
[/quote]
I think you should retake the quiz, the point is to learn that use google before you ask for something.[/quote]
75% of the time they couldn’t find it, more 5%, usually people just ask before google cause they are lazy.

Read full topic
